content.raw:
It depends on how long we want to make the transition process last. We would eventually remove all `gazebo::math` from the gazebo code base. So users will have to update their code to use `ignition::math` at some point. I lean towards the "off like a bandaid" approach. 

I also believe (maybe incorrectly) that most people don't rely heavily on `gazebo::math`.
